overview:
## Discussion

Use this method to update the available shipping methods and, if a shipping method has been selected, the current shipping cost.

When this method is called, you create a new array of valid [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKShippingMethod] objects for the specified address. You also create an array of [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItem] objects that represent the updated cost. The summary items should include the shipping cost if a valid shipping method has been selected. For more information on updating these values, see the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest] class’s [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/shippingMethods] and [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/paymentSummaryItems] properties.

# paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelectShippingAddress:completion:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the delegate that the user selected a shipping address.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func paymentAuthorizationViewController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, didSelectShippingAddress address: ABRecord, completion: @escaping (PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus, [PKShippingMethod], [PKPaymentSummaryItem]) -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **controller**: The payment authorization view controller.
- **address**: An address book record representing the selected shipping method.
- **completion**: The completion block to be called with updated shipping information.

This block takes the following parameters:



## Discussion

Use this method to update the available shipping methods and, if a shipping method has been selected, the current shipping cost.

When this method is called, you create a new array of valid [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKShippingMethod] objects for the specified address. You also create an array of [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentSummaryItem] objects that represent the updated cost. The summary items should include the shipping cost if a valid shipping method has been selected. For more information on updating these values, see the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest] class’s [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/shippingMethods] and [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/paymentSummaryItems] properties.
